patthana14.35:1.1: Niyataṁ dhammaṁ paṭicca naniyato dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā … tīṇi.
patthana14.35:2.1: Aniyataṁ dhammaṁ paṭicca naniyato dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā.
patthana14.35:3.1: Niyatañca aniyatañca dhammaṁ paṭicca naniyato dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā.  (Saṅkhittaṁ.)
patthana14.35:4.1: Hetuyā pañca, ārammaṇe dve …pe… vipāke ekaṁ …pe… avigate pañca.
